title: Restore your Celo Wallet
userYourBackupKey: Already have a Celo Wallet? Enter your Backup Key to restore it to this phone.
backupKeyPrompt: horse leopard dog monkey shark tiger lemur whale squid wolf squirrel mouse lion elephant cat shrimp bear penguin deer turtle fox zebra goat giraffe
backupKeyTip: Backup Keys are 24 words long, separated by a space.
useEmptyAnyway: Would you like to use it anyway?
